aboutMe: I am a passionate frontend developer based in Donaueschingen, Germany, dedicated to transforming creative concepts into digital experiences. I enjoy collaborating with innovative minds to bring ideas to life and shape the future. Throughout my career as a developer, I actively seek opportunities for a position as a junior web developer. If you believe that my skills align with your project requirements, feel free to reach out to me. I look forward to contributing to your team's success!
myWorkDescription: This page showcases samples of my work. Please feel free to explore and try them out.
project_1: Task manager inspired by the Kanban system. Create and organize tasks, assign users and categories, and manage your contacts.
project_2: Get ready for an exciting adventure in a jump, run, and throw game crafted with an object-oriented approach. Assist Pepe in his quest for coins and Tabasco salsa, and help him confront the wild hen.
project_3: Built upon the PokéAPI, this simple library serves to provide and catalog Pokémon information.
project_4: This website was developed to showcase my skills, experiences, and projects as a web developer. With the help of the Angular framework, I have created a user-friendly and visually appealing website that allows visitors to learn more about me and my work.
name: Your Name
privacyPolicy_3: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
contact_3: Feel free to reach out to me using this form. I'm eager to connect, learn about your ideas, and contribute to your projects with my skills.
